models.name: Silverado 1500
models.title: 2025 Chevrolet Silverado 1500 | Pickup Truck | Chevrolet Canada
models.description: The 2025 Silverado 1500 offers advanced interior technology that puts infotainment at your fingertips — keeping you connected almost anywhere the day takes you.

disclosures.text: Price includes freight; $100 A/C charge; up to $699 dealer fee; estimated Federal Luxury Tax, if applicable to your vehicle; and other fees, levies and duties (all of which may vary by region and/or dealer). Licence, insurance, registration and applicable sales taxes are extra. Dealers may be free to set individual prices. Factory order or dealer trade may be required. See dealer for details.

sections.title: CHEVROLET EARNED MORE DEPENDABILITY AWARDS FOR TRUCKS THAN ANY OTHER BRAND *
sections.body:
-J.D Power, 2025 U.S Vehicle Dependability Study
-J.D Power, 2025 U.S Vehicle Dependability Study

sections.title: Towing tenacity
sections.body:
With proven trailering technology and eight available cameras * offering up to 14 views, * Silverado provides everything you need for a long day of towing.
With proven trailering technology and eight available cameras * offering up to 14 views, * Silverado provides everything you need for a long day of towing.
From hitching to driving to parking, Silverado offers advanced camera technologies that are designed to help make your towing job easier from start to finish. Available on Silverado LT, RST, LT Trail Boss, LTZ, ZR2 and High Country.
Trailer Side Blind Zone Alert is a trailering feature that provides visual side-mirror alerts when a moving vehicle is detected in a side blind zone that is extended to trailer lengths.

sections.title: Super Cruise capability (3-year trial period included)
sections.body:
Available on High Country, Super Cruise TM capability * (3-year trial period included) * offers hands-free driver assistance, managing speed and steering to keep you refreshed during your adventures — even while towing. Enjoy exploring more kilometres of compatible highways with the most advanced hands-free driving system in its class. *
Available on High Country, Super Cruise TM capability * (3-year trial period included) * offers hands-free driver assistance, managing speed and steering to keep you refreshed during your adventures — even while towing. Enjoy exploring more kilometres of compatible highways with the most advanced hands-free driving system in its class. *
Super Cruise with Trailering * Allows you to tow your heavy load hands-free. No other competitor offers a hands-free driving system with towing capability.*
Super Cruise with Trailering * Allows you to tow your heavy load hands-free. No other competitor offers a hands-free driving system with towing capability.*
Automatic comfort and convenience Automatically adjusts the gap between you and the vehicle ahead for extra stopping distance.
Automatic comfort and convenience Automatically adjusts the gap between you and the vehicle ahead for extra stopping distance.
Turn on Activate Super Cruise when the white Super Cruise icon appears on the instrument cluster.
Turn on Activate Super Cruise when the white Super Cruise icon appears on the instrument cluster.
Lights on When the Super Cruise symbol and steering wheel indicator turn green, you’re ready to go hands-free.
Lights on When the Super Cruise symbol and steering wheel indicator turn green, you’re ready to go hands-free.
Hands off Let go of the wheel and enjoy the largest mapped hands-free driving network in North America.
Hands off Let go of the wheel and enjoy the largest mapped hands-free driving network in North America.

sections.title: Additional Safety and Driver Assistance Features
sections.body:
There’s a lot more to the Chevrolet story and we’re committed to making sure you can start every drive with some peace of mind.
There’s a lot more to the Chevrolet story and we’re committed to making sure you can start every drive with some peace of mind.

trims.name: WT
features: 40/20/40 split-bench front seat with covered armrest storage and underseat storage
Available Adaptive Cruise Control *
Available 5.3L EcoTec3 V8 engine
Available 10-speed automatic transmission
Durabed featuring class-leading cargo volume and 12 standard tie-downs*

trims.name: Custom
features: TurboMax™ engine with 430 lb.-ft. of torque
20-inch Bright Silver-painted aluminum wheels
Trailering Package, remote vehicle starter system, and EZ Lift power lock and release tailgate
10-way power driver seat including lumbar control and 40/20/40 split-bench front seat with covered armrest storage and under-seat storage
Chevrolet Safety Assist *

trims.name: LT
trims.tagline: Strength and style — all day, every day
features: 13.4-inch diagonal colour touch-screen display and 12.3-inch diagonal reconfigurable Driver Information Centre
Front 40/20/40 split-bench seat and 10-way power driver seat
Available 20-inch painted-aluminum wheels with machined-face and Grazen-painted pockets
LED reflector headlamps and signature daytime running lamps
Chevrolet Safety Assist *

trims.name: RST
trims.tagline: Bold and sporty with street-inspired design
features: Available 5.3L V8, Class- Duramax 3.0L Turbo-Diesel engine, or 6.2L V8 engine Exclusive *
Body-colour centre grille bar, bumpers and door handles
13.4-inch diagonal colour touch-screen display and 12.3-inch diagonal reconfigurable Driver Information Centre
Available 20-inch high-gloss Black wheels
Available sport mode-enabled active exhaust
Front 40/20/40 split-bench seat and 10-way power driver seat
Chevrolet Safety Assist *

trims.name: Custom Trail Boss
trims.tagline: Ready to take on every off-road adventure
features: Available 5.3L V8 engine or Class- Duramax 3.0L Turbo-Diesel engine Exclusive *
2-inch factory suspension lift and Z71 Off-Road Package
Autotrac® 2-speed transfer case, automatic locking rear differential and skid plates
18-inch high-gloss Black-painted wheels with Goodyear Wrangler Territory® MT tires
Raised hood with styled Black insert
Chevrolet Safety Assist *

trims.name: LTZ
features: 13.4-inch diagonal colour touch-screen display and 12.3-inch diagonal enhanced multicolour reconfigurable Driver Information Centre
Perforated leather-appointed front seating surfaces
Front bucket seats with centre console
20-inch painted-aluminum wheels
Offering 8 cameras with up to 14 views *
Chevrolet Safety plus additional advanced safety and driver assistance technologies Assist *

trims.name: LT Trail Boss
features: Available 5.3L V8, Class- Duramax 3.0L Turbo-Diesel engine, or 6.2L V8 engine Exclusive *
2-inch factory suspension lift with Z71 Off-Road Package
Autotrac® 2-speed transfer case and automatic locking rear differential
20-inch High Gloss Black Painted Aluminum Wheels
13.4-inch diagonal colour touch-screen display and 12.3-inch diagonal enhanced multicolour reconfigurable
Driver Information Centre
Chevrolet Safety Assist *

trims.name: High Country
features: Available Class- Duramax 3.0L Turbo-Diesel engine or available 6.2L V8 engine Exclusive *
Premium leather seating surfaces with exclusive custom perforation and stitching pattern and authentic open-pore wood trim
13.4-inch diagonal colour touch-screen display and 12.3-inch diagonal enhanced multicolour reconfigurable Driver Information Centre
Available Super driver assistance capability with trailering (3-year trial period Cruise TM* included * )
Available power-retractable assist steps
Available sport mode-enabled active exhaust
Offering 8 cameras with up to 14 views *
Chevrolet Safety plus additional advanced safety and driver assistance technologies Assist *

trims.name: ZR2
features: Standard Class- Duramax 3.0L Turbo-Diesel engine or available 6.2L V8 engine Exclusive *
Multimatic DSSV™ dampers and front and rear E-lockers
Off-road cut front bumper and large underbody aluminum skid plates
33-inch Goodyear Wrangler Territory® MT tires
13.4-inch diagonal colour touch-screen display and 12.3-inch diagonal enhanced multicolour reconfigurable Driver Information Centre
Chevrolet Safety plus additional advanced safety and driver assistance technologies Assist *
